thread.title: andy moyes
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by andy moyes

author: andy moyes
title: andy moyes
text: This was shocking customer service at its worst.Unbelievable . The customer service was appalling.the car was delivered late to my partners work address and was advised.that the car would be taken away if we did not pay up. The email with the details to pay was issued only 5 minutes before the car arrived at my partners address. A horrible experience all round. .
